name: A Portal Home
description:
You are lost in space and need to rebuild your hyperspace portal to get home!

The goal is to search the planets surface for pieces of your broken planet. When found, take the piece back to the portal to rebuild it. When all of the four missing parts have been found, you can return home!

Disclaimer: the game will abruptly end after completing the portal.

Co-creator: Kevin

Cut features: Shooting // Enemies // Cave systems // actual sound design // ..
